results.title: Bali: island of magic
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Indonesia”.
Bali is one of the many Indonesian islands, but it differs from the other Muslim islands in that the people are mainly Hindu, with some Buddhists and an underlying interest in nature worship and even roots of ancient nature worship. Shows the daily life of the Balinese, which is governed by a voluntary village council, the farming and fishing, the market and the monkey dance. Narrated by Roger Climpson. No other credits available.

results.title: Strong and Proud
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Darren Atkinson
results.brief_description: Darren grew up on Cummeragunja Mission and in this digital story he talks about his grandfather’s life, the Koori community and the handing down of Indigenous traditions and culture from one generation to the next.
results.description: Darren grew up on Cummeragunja Mission and in this digital story he talks about his grandfather’s life, the Koori community and the handing down of Indigenous traditions and culture from one generation to the next.

results.title: Sumatra: island of rice and rubber
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Indonesia”
Scenes of life in Sumatra, one of the many islands of Indonesia. Shows the agricultural development and methods used by the rural population. Village life style and customs are also seen.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Indonesia”
Scenes of life in Sumatra, one of the many islands of Indonesia. Shows the agricultural development and methods used by the rural population. Village life style and customs are also seen.

results.title: Subconscious Password
results.creator_credit: Chris Landreth, Mark Smith, Marcy Page, Seneca College Animation Arts Centre, Copperheart Entertainment and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description:
Most of us have had at least one of those excruciating social encounters where you can’t remember someone’s name. Just what is your subconscious up to while you frantically try to recall it?
Cast includes: Don McKellar, Ron Pardo, Patrice Goodman, Ray Landry, Tony Daniels, Athena Karkanis, Nanci Pach, Kedar, Denise Oliver, Dwayne Hill, Chris Landreth and John R. Dilworth.
Music: Daniel Janke
Animation direction and layout: Sean Craig

results.title: Streets of Fitzroy
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Mick Booth
results.brief_description: Mick Booth was brought up in Kent Street, Fitzroy - an inner suburb of Melbourne. This is his story of childhood memories, family and growing up in Fitzroy.

results.title: Java: island of culture
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Indonesia”.
Illustrates the traditional Javanese arts of wood carving, painting, Batik dyeing, Wayang Kulit and Wayang Wong theatre as they are today, and briefly tours some of the ancient temples of the Island. Narrated by Roger Climpson.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Indonesia”.

results.title: Bali: island of gods and demons
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Indonesia”.
Bali, one of the many islands that make up the Indonesian nation, is a tropical paradise. Religion plays a great part in the daily life of the people and we see many fine temples and some of their religious ceremonies. Narrated by Roger Climpson. No other credits available.
